## Problem 1

### Read and clean Mr. Trash Wheel dataset

```{r}
mrtrashwheel_data = read_excel("./data/Trash-Wheel-Data.xlsx", 1, range = "A2:N535") %>%
janitor::clean_names() %>%
drop_na() %>%
mutate(
  sports_balls = as.integer(sports_balls)) 
```
